justification:
** - Criticizes opponents without fully embracing populist framework.

The text contains some populist elements (particularly anti-incumbent sentiment and promises of accountability) but doesn't fulfill all five dimensions of the populist framework. It's more aligned with standard political opposition messaging than a comprehensive populist narrative.
Anti-elite rhetoric present, but lacks strong people-centric unified narrative.
Criticizes elites, but lacks clear populist people-centrism.
** Criticizes elites, lacks clear people-centrism and indivisibility.
â€” lacks homogenous people and singular general will references
Fails to explicitly state people should have exclusive sovereignty/final say.
Exhibits elements of anti-elitism and people-centrism, but lacks strong Manichean framing.
